buttons.wantToDeleteAccount: I want to delete my account

errors.accountDeleteFailedOrgOwner1: You cannot delete your account whilst you are the owner of an organization.
errors.accountDeleteFailedOrgOwner2: For each organization you are the owner of, please either assign your ownership to another user or delete the organization to continue.
errors.usernameTaken: This username is already in use, please pick a different name

accounts.unlinkAccountNotice: If you unlink this account you won't be able to log in with it any more; please make sure your email is valid.

delete.accountDeletedInfo: Your account has been successfully deleted.
delete.deleteNotice1: Deleting your user account will delete all data and cannot be undone. Make sure you want to do this.
delete.deleteNotice2: To protect your account, we require you to confirm you wish to delete your account here, then you will be sent an email with a confirmation code (to check your identity) and when you click that link you will be asked to confirm your account deletion again.
delete.deleteNotice3: Press this button and your account will be deleted.
delete.deleteNotice4: You've been sent an email with a confirmation link in it, you must click it to confirm that you are the account holder so that you may continue deleting your account.
delete.deleteNotice5: Deleting your account cannot be undone, you will lose all your data.

modals.content1: Before we can delete your account, we need to confirm it's definitely you. We'll send you an email with a link in it, which when clicked will give you the option to delete your account.
modals.content2: You should not trigger this unless you're sure you want to delete your account.
modals.title: Send delete account confirmation email?

emails.accountNoticeInfo1: Account notices will be sent your primary email address.
emails.accountNoticeInfo2: Additional email addresses may be added to help with account recovery (or to change your primary email), but they cannot be used until verified.

notVerified.description: You do not have any verified email addresses, this will make account recovery impossible and may limit your available functionality within this application. Please complete email verification.

emails.pendingVerification: Pending verification (please check your inbox / spam folder)

security.socialLoginNoPassword: You registered your account through social login, so you do not currently have a passphrase. If you would like a passphrase, press the button below to request a passphrase reset email to '{{email}}' (you can choose a different email by making it primary in)
